intro: The jurisdiction of Hong Kong has gained increasing attention as a perfect destination for the incorporation of companies that allow banking, international trade, investment and asset protection activities.
Its sound reputation for business, excellent policy on taxes and uncomplicated requirements are some of the factors that motivate corporations and investors to expand into global markets.
FEATURES OF THE HONG KONG JURISDICTION
highlights: Excellent availability of company names for incorporation.
The name “Limited” can be used in company names.
Relatively easy administration if the activities of the company are simple and conducted outside of Hong Kong.
The company’s accounting books can be kept and maintained abroad.
The share capital need not be fully paid up
Reasonable formation and maintenance costs and fees
uses: British territory until 1997, when it became a special administrative region of China with autonomous power.
Ranks among the top twenty trading economies in the world.
Major gateway for trade investment and finance into China and the rest of Asia.
Long tradition of political and economic stability of the country.
social: Location: Southern tip of Guangdong, province of China.
Industry: Banking, professional services and shipping
